title: Emerald Bloom Jhumka - A Symphony of Tradition and Elegance
materials: Cultured Pearls. Features a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced brilliance.
features: These stunning jhumkas feature a delicate floral design at the top, leading to a traditionally shaped jhumka (bell) adorned with intricately set CZ stones. The open filigree work showcases exceptional craftsmanship. A single, lustrous pearl adds a touch of classic charm. The Emerald adds a regal touch, reminiscent of Nizami jewelry traditions.
colors: with a vibrant pop of green from the emerald and the soft ivory of the pearl. The contrast creates a visually appealing and harmonious palette.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
traditional ceremonies such as half-saree functions (Vayyaralu)
or any event where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for contemporary parties and celebrations.
description: These jhumkas blend traditional South Indian design with a modern aesthetic. The high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and durability. The Emerald center stone adds a touch of luxury and prestige. The Hyderabadi polish lends a unique brilliance, setting this piece apart. They are lightweight and comfortable to wear, making them ideal for long events.
